TopicTitle: you don't lke the flags that are in KSP we'll heres a guide for changing them

Articles.Content:
i don't know of this is the right place to post this but if it isn't then could someone who knows push me in the right direction?

so i didn't like the flags that much in KSP so we'll i dwelled i to the program files and i found it was so very easy to just repaint them or add new ones.

so for the guide it is wery easy you as you downloaded this (direcly dowloaded from the website not from steam) you should have gotten a folder that says KSP_OSK or whatever it is named in windows you should enter this folder and then enter GameData/Squad/flags and you should see a list of all of the flags now pick one preferebly the one your using. the right click it and chose to edit it with any program you want then export to PNG into the same folder with the same name!! this should pop up a window saying that there is already a file there chose replace and you should be done.

if you do not want to offer a flag to paint a new one you can just chose to make a new one by picking you favorite picture editing software then making a picture 160x256 pixels and start to paint, then export it like you would otherwise

if you did not chose the one that you are using i will put up a guide on how to change than in a few days and i'll try to put a link here.

Hoped this helped /Me

This info is also on the Wiki FYI.

However, might as well also point out the folder is the same for Steam.
I just made my first flag today. It matches my new signature.
